title: [v1.9.0] Node sync has fallen behind by x slots
body:
### Describe the bug


Debug logs:  [debug.log](https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/files/11846506/debug.log)

### Expected behavior

Should not show "Node sync has fallen behind by x slots" warnings on every startup.

### Steps to reproduce

```
./lodestar beacon \
    --dataDir /home/devops/goerli/data/beacon \
    --rest \
    --rest.address "0.0.0.0" \
    --rest.namespace '*' \
    --metrics \
    --execution.urls http://localhost:8551 \
    --jwt-secret /home/devops/goerli/data/jwtsecret \
    --logLevel info \
    --network goerli \
    --checkpointSyncUrl "https://beaconstate-goerli.chainsafe.io/"  \
```

### Additional context

_No response_

### Operating system

Linux

### Lodestar version or commit hash

v1.9.0
